channel.title: NPCDrops XML Creator
channel.description:
A very simple and small program to create your NPC drops with. Created for rs2 - server 474. I've included the source, so if you've got a different file-structure, you can edit it on your own.
The program is written in C# using Visual Studio 2010.
Note: Before opening the program; make sure you have the file named [I]itemDefinitions.bin[/I] in the same directory as the program.
Download executable: [url=http://www.multiupload.nl/GNA7VI53RY]Executable[/url] or [url=http://localhostr.com/DzaEiPSDmByb]Executable[/url] or [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?a999lj99qafc2co]Executable[/url] Download source: [url=http://www.multiupload.nl/U4RHGZR9I6]Source[/url] or [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?4sc63gib3vgp86x]Source[/url] or [url=http://localhostr.com/zbIrSbeqCVLH]Source[/url]
Virus scan executable: [url=https://www.virustotal.com/file/42c944d74689c8afde904086bab2844adf1827001ffda45e4dbfc536a8c16e39/analysis/1345291737/]Virus scan[/url]
Choose items from a dropdown list: [img]http://img1.uploadscreenshot.com/images/orig/8/22922395581-orig.png[/img]
Result: [img]http://img1.uploadscreenshot.com/images/orig/8/22922391814-orig.png[/img]
If you've got any questions, problems etc. let me know!
